title: Work done on particle by various forces

content.prompt:
Work is done by a force on a particle in which
of the following situations?

I. The force is directed parallel to the velocity of the particle.

II. The force results from an electric field
that is parallel to the velocity of a charged particle.

III. The force results from a magnetic field that is perpendicular to the velocity of a charged particle.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
